form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Title: Palo Alto Mutual Savings and Loan Association\nForm Number: 515 Ramona Street, Palo Alto, California Davenport 6-2790

full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/18/2023 Palo Allo Mutual AND LORN ASSOCIATION Palo Alto Mutual Savings AND LOAN ASSOCIATION 515 RAMONA STREET, PALO ALTI O. CALIFORNIA DAVENPORT -2790 August 13, 1962 TO WHOM IT MAY CONCERN: We hereby certify that we service a loan secured by Deed of Trust for Harry Wong and Katherine C. Wong. We have serviced the loan since July 1955, the original amount of loan was $10,250.00 and present unpaid balance is $6,333.97. Monthly payments are $85.00. Palo Alto Mutual Savings & Loan Association Richard W Zimmer Controller MEMBER . FEDERAL HOME LOAN BANK SYSTEM . FEDERAL SAVINGS AND LOAN INSURANCE CORPORATION
